scripts.release: zsh -c 'mkdir "./Release" && mkdir "./Release/WordPress Codex" && cp -r {Images/,Json/,main.py,plugin.json} "./Release/WordPress Codex/" && cd "./Release/" && zip -r "WordPress Codex.zip" "./WordPress Codex/" && mv "WordPress Codex.zip" "../WordPress Codex.zip" && cd ../ && rm -rf "./Release"'
